text: Are you looking for some help when looking into the cosmos? The iOptron SkyGuider Pro Camera Mount maybe what you're looking for. This is an ideal companion for people getting into astrophotography as well as a small package for more seasoned shooters.Adorama has the iOptron SkyGuider Pro Camera Mount Full Package for $298 (Reg $398) as their Deal of the Day.iOptron SkyGuider Pro Camera Mount Full PackageAdvanced astrophotography tracking with 4 speeds: 1X celestial, 1/2X landscape, solar, and lunarDurable, all-metal structure with an 11 lbs payload for heavy camera/lens setupsPrecision-engineered for silent tracking, perfect for long-term exposuresEasy polar alignment with detachable alt-azi base and illuminated polar scopeBuilt-in rechargeable battery offering up to 20 hours of operationMore about the iOptron Skyguider ProExplore the cosmos with the SkyGuider Pro Camera Mount Full Package from iOptron, a leader in the camera tracker market. html:
Are you looking for some help when looking into the cosmos? The iOptron SkyGuider Pro Camera Mount maybe what you're looking for. This is an ideal companion for people getting into astrophotography as well as a small package for more seasoned shooters.

Adorama has the iOptron SkyGuider Pro Camera Mount Full Package for $298 (Reg $398) as their Deal of the Day.

iOptron SkyGuider Pro Camera Mount Full Package

  • Advanced astrophotography tracking with 4 speeds: 1X celestial, 1/2X landscape, solar, and lunar
  • Durable, all-metal structure with an 11 lbs payload for heavy camera/lens setups
  • Precision-engineered for silent tracking, perfect for long-term exposures
  • Easy polar alignment with detachable alt-azi base and illuminated polar scope
  • Built-in rechargeable battery offering up to 20 hours of operation

More about the iOptron Skyguider Pro

Explore the cosmos with the SkyGuider Pro Camera Mount Full Package from iOptron, a leader in the camera tracker market. This advanced, professional-grade device is designed for astrophotography enthusiasts, offering a sturdy and durable all-metal mechanical structure that can handle a payload of up to 11 lbs (5kg), making it suitable for heavy camera/lens systems and even lightweight telescopes.

This high-quality camera mount offers silent tracking for smooth camera motion, making it perfect for long-term exposures. It features four tracking speeds (1X, 1/2X, solar and lunar), allowing you to capture stunning images of the sky, stars, and landscapes simultaneously. The 1X celestial tracking is ideal for imaging the sky and stars, while the 1/2X tracking speed is perfect for capturing both the starry night and the landscapes at the same time.
